testcase.name: Verify available products on inventory page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Verify available products on inventory page Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.192s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.062s Then Verify user should see 6 products listed ... passed in 0.026s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify sorting of products by different options -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: Verify sorting of products by different options -- @1.1 Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.172s Then Verify user is on the inventory page ... passed in 0.063s When The user sort products by 'az' ... passed in 2.449s Then Verify the products should be sorted by 'name ascending' order ... passed in 0.010s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
